casebody.data:
2016-1303 (La. 11/2/16)

Phyllis Marie MATTHEWS v. UNITED FIRE & CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY, Doctor Pipe, Inc. and Danny Anthony Robert No. 2016-CC-1303 Supreme Court of Louisiana. November 2, 2016

Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Orleans, Civil District *212Court Div. E, No. 2014-6251; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2016-C-0389

h Granted and remanded to the Court of Appeal for briefing, argument and opinion.
